- - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Robert, No problem thank you for letting me know. Look forward to talking to you another time! Take care,Sara From: Rob Fagerson [mailto:rfagerson@msn.com] Sent: Monday, June 11, 2012 10:13 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Consultation Call Appointment Reminder Sara, I am sorry, i am being called to a management mtg at 10:30 and I need to cancel our appointment. I will reschedule when I am at my calendar again.
Rob FagersonDate: Sun, 10 Jun 2012 04:29:23 -0400 From: no-reply@timedriver.com <mailto:no-reply@timedriver.com> To: rfagerson@msn.com <mailto:rfagerson@msn.com> Subject: Consultation Call Appointment Reminder Appointment Reminder
This is a reminder of your appointment with Sara Conde . Activity: Consultation CallDate: Monday, June 11, 2012Time: 10:30am EDT (45 minutes)Instructions: Sara Conde will call you at 734-787-6151 Powered by TimeTrade <http://www.timetrade.com/email-powered-by.aspx>
